<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>1.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B></B><B><U>Defined Terms and Interpretations</U></B> </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">As used in the Securities Purchase Agreement (including the attached Exhibits) and in respect of the certificates for and terms and conditions of the
Notes, the following terms shall have the specified meanings (unless otherwise defined therein): </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Arrangers</B>&#148; means Citibank, N.A. and Westdeutsche Landesbank Girozentrale, each in its capacity as Arranger under the Senior Secured
Credit Agreement; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Banks</B>&#148; means the
Arrangers and the other financial institutions from time to time party to the Senior Secured Credit Agreement; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Business Day</B>&#148; means any day (other than a Saturday or Sunday) on which banks are not required or authorized to close in New York City
and Budapest; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Clause</B>&#148; means, subject to any
contrary indication, a reference to a Clause hereof; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Condition</B>&#148; and &#147;<B>Conditions</B>&#148; shall have the meanings ascribed thereto herein; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Dispute</B>&#148; shall mean any dispute or difference arising out of or in connection with this Note, including any question as to its
existence, validity or termination; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Expiration
Date</B>&#148; means March 31, 2007, or if such day is not a Business Day, the next succeeding day which is a Business Day; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Facility Agent</B>&#148; means, at any time, the facility agent for the Banks under the Senior Secured Credit Agreement at such time, being as at
the date of the amendment and restatement of the Notes, Citibank International plc; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Finance Documents</B>&#148; means, at any time, each of the Securities Purchase Agreement, the Warrant Agreement and any other document, notice, instrument or agreement entered into or delivered pursuant to
any of the foregoing, and &#147;<B>Finance Document</B>&#148; shall mean any or each such document, notice, instrument or agreement; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Finance Parties</B>&#148; has the meaning ascribed to such term in the Senior Secured Credit Agreement; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Fixed Margin</B>&#148; means in relation to each Interest Period or
other relevant period six per cent (6%) per annum; <U>provided</U> that if the interest on the Notes is duly paid on the Interest Payment Date for an Interest Period when due, then the Fixed Margin for such Interest Period shall be three and
one-half per cent (3<FONT SIZE="1"><SUP>&nbsp;1</SUP></FONT><FONT SIZE="2">/</FONT><FONT SIZE="1">2</FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#000000">%) per annum; </FONT></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Governmental Authority</B>&#148; means any nation or government, any state or other political
subdivision thereof and any entity exercising executive, legislative, judicial, regulatory or administrative functions of or pertaining to government; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>HTCC Consulting</B>&#148; means HTCC Tanacsado Reszvenytarsasag; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>HTCC Group&#148;</B> means the Issuer and each of its subsidiaries; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>holder</B>&#148; has the meaning ascribed to such term in Clause
5.2; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Hungary</B>&#148; means the Republic of
Hungary; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Interbank Rate</B>&#148; means in relation
to any Interest Period or other period, the arithmetic mean (rounded upward to the nearest four decimal places) of the offered quotations for U.S. dollar deposits for such period which appear on the relevant Telerate Page of the Telerate Service
which displays a British Bankers Association Interest Settlement Rate for U.S. dollars (or such other page or such other service as may replace such page and/or service, as appropriate, for the purpose of displaying London Interbank Offered Rates of
leading banks) at or about 11:00 a.m. (London time) on the applicable Quotation Day; <U>provided</U> that if there is one only or no such offered quotations on the relevant Telerate Page of the Telerate Service or there is no relevant Telerate Page,
the applicable interest rate shall be the arithmetic mean (rounded upwards, if not already such a multiple of one-sixteenth of one per cent (0.0625%)) of the rates at which each of the Reference Banks was offering to prime banks in the Budapest
Interbank market deposits in U.S. dollars at or about 11:00 a.m. (Budapest time) on the applicable Quotation Day for a period equal to such period and in an amount comparable with the amount to be outstanding during such period; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Interest Payment Date</B>&#148; has the meaning ascribed to it in
Clause 14.2; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Interest Payment Default</B>&#148;
means any interest payment when due on the Interest Payment Date therefor shall fail to be made and such failure shall continue for at least 365 consecutive days after such Interest Payment Date; <U>provided</U>, <U>however</U> that no Interest
Payment Default shall be deemed to have occurred hereunder if, within 10 days after the end of such 365-day period, the Noteholder shall have received all interest accrued (including, without limitation, interest accruing pursuant to Clause 15.1)
from such Interest Payment Date to the date the interest payment is made; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Interest Period</B>&#148; means, subject as provided below, in relation to any Note, a period of six (6) months provided that: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">if any Interest Period would otherwise end on a day which is not a Business Day, that Interest Period shall be extended to the next succeeding Business Day unless the result of such
extension would be to carry such Interest Period over into another calendar month in which event such Interest Period shall end on the last preceding Business Day; and </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">any Interest Period which commences on the last day of a calendar month and any Interest Period which commences on a day for which there is no numerically </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">corresponding day in the calendar month which is the relevant number of months after the commencement of
such Interest Period shall end on the last Business Day of the calendar month which is the relevant number of calendar months after the commencement of such Interest Period; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Issue Date</B>&#148; means, as to any Note, the date(s) specified as such in such Note; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Issuer</B>&#148; means Hungarian Telephone and Cable Corp., a
corporation formed under the laws of the State of Delaware; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Majority Lenders</B>&#148; has the meaning ascribed to such term in the Senior Secured Credit Agreement; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Mandatory Prepayment Event</B>&#148; means any of the following: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) while any Senior Obligations shall remain unpaid or any commitment under the Senior Secured Credit
Agreement shall be in force, the occurrence of (i) any Senior Default or (ii) an Interest Payment Default; or </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) at any time after the Senior Obligations shall have been paid in full and the commitments under the Senior Secured Credit Agreement
shall have been terminated, (i) the occurrence of any &#147;Event of Default&#148; (as defined in the Senior Secured Credit Agreement as in effect immediately prior to such payment and termination) or (ii) the Issuer shall fail to make any payment
(whether of principal, interest or otherwise) when due under this Note; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>month</B>&#148; is a reference to a period starting on one day in a calendar month and ending on the numerically corresponding day in the next succeeding calendar month save that, where any such period would
otherwise end on a day which is not a Business Day, it shall end on the next succeeding Business Day, unless that day falls in the calendar month succeeding that in which it would otherwise have ended, in which case it shall end on the immediately
preceding Business Day if a period starts on the last Business Day in a calendar month or if there is no numerically corresponding day in the month in which that period ends, that period shall end on the last business day in that later month;
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Noteholder</B>&#148; has the meaning ascribed to
such term in Clause 5.2; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Notes</B>&#148; means the
notes issued in accordance with the Securities Purchase Agreement, as such notes have been amended and restated on April 11, 2000, and to which the Conditions contained herein are applicable; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Person</B>&#148; means an individual, partnership, corporation
(including a business trust), joint stock issuer, estate, trust, limited liability issuer, unincorporated association, joint venture or other entity, or a Governmental Authority; </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Post-Petition Interest&#148;</B> means interest at the contract rate accruing subsequent to the
filing of a petition initiating any proceeding in bankruptcy, insolvency or like proceeding whether or not such interest is an allowed claim enforceable against the debtor in any proceeding under any applicable bankruptcy law; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Quotation Day</B>&#148; means in relation to any Interest Period or
other period, the day on which interest rate quotations are ordinarily given by prime banks in the London Interbank Market for deposits in U.S. dollars for delivery on the first day of the Interest Period or other such period; provided that, if, for
any such period, quotations would ordinarily be given on more than one day, the Quotation Day for such period will be the last of those days; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Reference Banks</B>&#148; means the principal London offices of ABN AMRO Bank N.V., Citibank N.A. and ING Bank N.V., or such other bank or banks
as may from time to time be agreed between the Issuer and the Noteholders, such agreement not to be unreasonably withheld or delayed; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Register</B>&#148; means the register to be kept by the Issuer in which the Noteholders from time to time of the Notes are registered;
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Schedule</B>&#148; shall, subject to any contrary
indication, be construed as a reference to a schedule hereto; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Senior Default</B>&#148; means, while any Senior Obligations shall remain unpaid or any commitment under the Senior Secured Credit Agreement shall be in force, the occurrence of &#147;Event of Default&#148; (as defined in the
Senior Secured Credit Agreement) and the acceleration of the maturity of the Senior Obligations in accordance with the terms thereof, if such acceleration shall continue for at least 365 consecutive days after the Facility Agent has so elected such
acceleration; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Senior Guaranty</B>&#148; means the
Deed of Guarantee No. 6 dated as of April 11, 2000 among the Issuer, as guarantor, Citibank Rt., as Security Agent and beneficiary and Hungarotel T&aacute;vk&ouml;zl&eacute;si Koncesszi&oacute;s R&eacute;szv&eacute;nyt&aacute;rsas&aacute;g,
R&Aacute;BA-COM T&aacute;vk&ouml;zl&eacute;si Koncesszi&oacute;s R&eacute;szv&eacute;nyt&aacute;rsas&aacute;g, P&aacute;pa &eacute;s T&eacute;rs&eacute;ge T&aacute;vk&ouml;zl&eacute;si Koncesszi&oacute;s R&eacute;szv&eacute;nyt&aacute;rsas&aacute;g,
and KNC Kelet-N&oacute;gr&aacute;d COM T&aacute;vk&ouml;zl&eacute;si Koncesszi&oacute;s R&eacute;szv&eacute;nyt&aacute;rsas&aacute;g, as countersignors; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Senior Indebtedness</B>&#148; means all indebtedness and other obligations of any member of the HTCC Group to the Finance Parties under or in
connection with the Senior Loan Agreements; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Senior
Loan Agreements</B>&#148; means the Senior Secured Credit Agreement, the Senior Guaranty, the Senior Security Deposit Agreement, the Senior Security Agreement, and each &#147;Senior Finance Document&#148; (as defined in the Senior Secured Credit
Agreement) and, in each case, any other agreement relating to the obligations thereunder; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Senior Obligations&#148;</B> means the principal, premium, if any, interest (including Post-Petition Interest), penalties, fees, expenses, claims, charges, indemnity obligations, attorneys&#146; fees and
expenses, and other liabilities with respect to the Senior Indebtedness; </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Senior Secured Credit Agreement</B>&#148; means the EUR 130,000,000 Secured Senior Debt Facility
Agreement dated as of April 11, 2000 among Hungarotel T&aacute;vk&ouml;zl&eacute;si Koncesszi&oacute;s R&eacute;szv&eacute;nyt&aacute;rsas&aacute;g, R&Aacute;BA-COM T&aacute;vk&ouml;zl&eacute;si Koncesszi&oacute;s
R&eacute;szv&eacute;nyt&aacute;rsas&aacute;g, P&aacute;pa &eacute;s T&eacute;rs&eacute;ge T&aacute;vk&ouml;zl&eacute;si Koncesszi&oacute;s R&eacute;szv&eacute;nyt&aacute;rsas&aacute;g, and KNC Kelet-N&oacute;gr&aacute;d COM
T&aacute;vk&ouml;zl&eacute;si Koncesszi&oacute;s R&eacute;szv&eacute;nyt&aacute;rsas&aacute;g, as Borrowers; the Issuer and HTCC Consulting, as Guarantors; Citibank, N.A. and Westdeutsche Landesbank Girozentrale, as Arrangers; the Facility Agent;
Citibank Rt., as Security Agent; and the financial institutions party to the Senior Secured Credit Agreement in their capacity as lenders; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P

Security Agent; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Senior Security Deposit

R&eacute;szv&eacute;nyt&aacute;rsas&aacute;g, and KNC Kelet-N&oacute;gr&aacute;d COM T&aacute;vk&ouml;zl&eacute;si Koncesszi&oacute;s R&eacute;szv&eacute;nyt&aacute;rsas&aacute;g, as countersignors; </FONT></P> <P

repayment in full in cash of the Senior Obligations and (b) March 31, 2007; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT

STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Subordination Event&#148;</B> means the occurrence of any &#147;Event of Default&#148; as defined in the Senior Secured Credit Agreement;
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Tax</B>&#148; means any tax, levy, impost, duty or
other charge of a similar nature (including, without limitation, any penalty or interest payable in connection with any failure to pay or any delay in paying any of the same); </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT

&#147;<B>U.S.$</B>&#148; means the lawful currency of the United States of America; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT

SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>winding up</B>&#148;, &#147;<B>dissolution</B>&#148;, &#147;<B>administration</B> or

which the Issuer or corporation carries on business, including the seeking of liquidation, winding up, re-organization, dissolution, administration, arrangement, adjustment, protection or relief of debtors. </FONT></P> <P

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Save where the contrary is indicated, any reference herein to: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">the Securities Purchase Agreement or any other agreement or document shall be construed as a reference to the Securities Purchase Agreement or, as the case may be, such other
agreement or document as the same may have been, or may from </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">time to time be, amended, varied, novated or supplemented to the extent expressly permitted by the terms
of the Senior Loan Agreements; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">a reference to any Person includes its successors and permitted transferees and permitted assigns; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">a statute shall be construed as a reference to such statute as the same may have been, or may from time to time be, amended or re-enacted; and </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">a reference to the Senior Secured Credit Agreement, the Senior Guaranty, the Senior Security Deposit Agreement and any other Senior Loan Agreement, shall be construed as a reference

<TR>
